title: Example:
text:
Let's say Saiyin wants to resolve her attack agaisnt Skoll with the roll we calculated in the previous examples.

She chooses three Hits from the pool of 4 dice, a Crit!

Looking at the Wither Soul attack on Saiyin's card to see that a Crit will inflict 4 damage .

Skoll is a Defender , a class with skill at resisting damage. He has a resilience (RES) of 1. So the 4 damage from Wither Soul 's Crit only inflicts 3 damage on him.

ATTACK DAMAGE - RESILIENCE = FINAL DAMAGE

Let's apply the formula:

DAMAGE is  4 (CRIT) -  1 (RES)  =  3

Skoll loses 3 health , going from 21 to 18 health, and marks it on his Health Card.
